content: रंध्रं {@--1@} A hole, an aperture, a cavity, an opening, a chasm, fissure; रंध्रेष्विवालक्ष्यनभःप्रदेशा <ls>R. 13. 56.</ls> <ls n="R.">15. 82</ls>; नासाग्ररंध्रं <ls>Māl. 1. 1</ls> क्रौंचरंध्रं <ls>Me. 57.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) A weak or vulnerable point, assailable point; रंध्रोपनिपातिनोऽनर्थाः <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; रंध्रान्वेषणदक्षाणां द्विषामामिषतां ययौ <ls>R. 12. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 17</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 61.</ls> ({%b%}) A defect, fault, an imperfection. {@--3@} A symbolical expression for the number ‘nine’, (there being nine openings in the human body).
